entry.title: Natural Tone Burlap Jute 1 Piece Chair Sash With Red Stripes
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2140
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 1.58

[About]

Each order is for 1 sash only Sashes are shipped untied.
Measurements: 6" wide x 108" long
Material: High quality Jute/Burlap + Stripe Style
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable.
For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
Buy Sash Buckles

[Information]

Introducing the Jute/Burlap runner that is sure to exude a classy taste while definitely blending in alongside the beautiful country look. Made with sturdy fabric and styled for a charming appeal, make sure to buy a few these for those outdoor bonding moments. We thought we'd add some stripe designs to create a more unique look for your rustic event, worthy of magazine spreads and covers. This High-Quality linen has been studied and refined after the rare Chambury House linen masterpieces because when everything just has to be perfect, then perfection begins with Chambury Casa linens!

Additional Information:

  • Measurements:Â 6" wide x 108" long
  • Material: High quality Jute/Burlap + Stripe Style
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Note: Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable. This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material. The smell can dissipate some by leaving in open air, but may still be noticeable. Please keep this in mind when ordering.

entry.title: 5 Pack | 6"x108" Silver/Black Taffeta Damask Flocking Chair Tie Bow Sash
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2140
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 3.99

[About]

Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
Measurements: 6"x108".
Material: Taffeta Flocking
How to Care: Dry Clean only.
Edges are serged to form an elegant look when tied into bow form.
For sashes only, does not include any other decorations.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
Buy Sash Buckles

[Information]

Our eye-catching taffeta flocking chair sash is an ideal choice to dress up those lackluster chair covers of your folding or banquet chairs. The seamless luster of high quality taffeta combined with the modish flocking design adds a chic appeal to these splendid chair sashes. Create a super classy party ambiance with these stylish chair sashes wrapped elegantly around your wedding or banquet chairs. Pair these with our flocking table tops, table runners, glitter accented centerpieces and LEDs for much exotic festive effect.

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • Measurements: 6"x108".
  • Material: Taffeta Flocking
  • How to Care: Dry Clean only.
  • Edges are serged to form an elegant look when tied into bow form.
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
